tool_description:
You need ssl certificate/private key for your dev project.
This API provides a self-signed certificate to allow you secure channel access to your development project.

PS: In a short time, you can also generate certificates using your private key.

DON'T USE THIS IN PRODUCTION, THIS IS ONLY FOR DEV.
name: ssl certificate generator
title: ssl certificate generator

api_list.name: You can get your certificate
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ssl-certificate-generator.p.rapidapi.com/cert/5c4b3d3d-5c4b-4b3d-3d5c-4b3d3d5c4b3d"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ssl-certificate-generator.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://ssl-certificate-generator.p.rapidapi.com/cert/{id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ssl-certificate-generator.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: get your key
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ssl-certificate-generator.p.rapidapi.com/key/5c4b3d3d-5c4b-4b3d-3d5c-4b3d3d5c4b3d"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ssl-certificate-generator.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
